abstract: Horse trainer Richard Dutrow Jr’s 10-year ban from racing in New York State is to begin, but Dutrow’s lawyer will be seeking a stay in state court in Schenectady, NY, in what could be the first step of what is likely to be a long and costly appeal process.
snippet: The trainer Richard Dutrow Jr.’s 10-year ban from racing in New York is to begin Tuesday, but Dutrow’s lawyer will be seeking a stay in state court on Monday.
lead_paragraph: The trainer Richard Dutrow Jr.’s 10-year ban from racing in New York is to begin Tuesday, but Dutrow’s lawyer will be seeking a stay in state court on Monday.

headline.main: With Business Already Down, Dutrow Awaits Ruling on 10-Year Suspension
headline.print_headline: With Business Already Down, Dutrow Awaits Ruling on 10-Year Suspension
headline.seo: Trainer Richard Dutrow Jr. Awaits Court Ruling to Stay 10-Year Ban
